revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Wayward Cave |image = [[File:Wayward Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Wayward Cave. |tokens = 56,500 |location = On Route 206, south of Eterna City. }} '''Wayward Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 651,500 |- | Bronzor (Boss) || 2,400,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Geodude * Onix * Bronzor (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
